name: Crazy Guns
description:
Erkan Yaprak | Leaf Game | 2022

It is a game made by Erkan Yaprak

This game is a clone of the game Spinny Guns made by Ubisoft&Ketchapp. But of course, Leaf Game has become an even better game with its quality.

You can download the game and shoot a video with the hashtag #leafGame on your social media accounts.

Good Games ;)
